ygData.subject: RE: Brad comments
ygData.msgSnippet: Im the poster, who he counter posted in his previous post regarding my misposting of the posting of when we were able to punch magic =) -Martyn ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Im the poster, who he counter posted in his previous post regarding my
misposting of the posting of when we were able to punch magic
=)
-Martyn

-----Original Message-----
From: firehawk@... [mailto:firehawk@...]
Sent: Tuesday, December 07, 1999 4:05 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Brad comments


From: firehawk@...

I fear Kit My friend you put the cart before the horse and misunderstood my
message. This was in part my fault for not including the orginal post, my
bad. I was refering to the posters post on the board contradicting Brad,
hence my modifier about when we got the ability to punch magic.

I am however curious what nerf was done to Accelerando?

On Tue, 7 Dec 1999 13:54:39 -0700 eqbards@onelist.com wrote:
> From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
> You got to be kidding me? Brad leaves out the Charm nerf for levels over
35
> and the nerfing of Accelerando, which GZ himself admitted was a nerf, not
a
> bug fix, and you think Brad's on target? How about the reduction to our
> DoT's? another minus. That's three big minuses in like 30 seconds, and
Brad
> got other developers input on his list? What were they working on,
> sovereign?
>
> Kit
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: firehawk@... [mailto:firehawk@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, December 07, 1999 10:14 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqbards] Brad comments
>
>
> From: firehawk@...
>
> For the most part on target in my opinion if a bit too pointed. You are
> mistaken however about our ability to hit magic only creatures. Magic
> gloves only started working as a magic attack for anyone other then monks
> about 4 patches ago IE about 2 months ago before that it was weapons or
> songs and that was the only damage you did. Now if we have a magic
> instrument or gloves we can punch magic only for damage while using the
> instrument.
>
>
>
> Adon
>
>
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
> with the subject submissions.
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
> with the subject submissions.



Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
